verses.name: Matthew 26:65
verses.text: Then the high priest rent his clothes, saying, He hath spoken blasphemy; what further need have we of witnesses? behold, now ye have heard his blasphemy.

verses.name: Matthew 26:66
verses.text: What think ye? They answered and said, He is guilty of death.

verses.name: Matthew 26:67
verses.text: Then did they spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands,

verses.name: Matthew 26:68
verses.text: Saying, Prophesy unto us, thou Christ, Who is he that smote thee?

verses.name: Matthew 26:69
verses.text: Now Peter sat without in the palace: and a damsel came unto him, saying, Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee.
